As the round proceeds, players accumulate several piles of prey in front of themselves, scoring one point for each prey card when the round ends. After as many rounds as players, whoever has the most points wins!

rpgseries: A Nation Mocked II: The Silence of the Damned
PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
217317.name: The Silence of the Damned
217317.description:
A Nation Mocked II: The Silence of the Damned

User summary:

This single interactive scenario was a major convention event with four complete rounds of play, each lasting about 2 hours. The first and fourth rounds were interactive (semi-LARP); the second and third rounds were tabletop. All players participated in Rounds 1, 2, and 4, and most players participated in Round 3. Round 1 was a plenary session; Round 2 had a planned sixteen simultaneous tables (4 of which continued throughout Rounds 2 & 3); Round 3 had a planned eight simultaneous tables; Round 4 had a planned four simultaneous tables and a plenary "finale".

See A Nation Mocked II: The Silence of the Damned for complete details (this complex scenario is made of up multiple documents, several with multiple versions).

217319.name: Picross e7
217319.description:
GAME DETAILS
The 7th game in the Picross e series, with a Navigation Feature!

The first game with 20x15-size Mega Picross puzzles.

The new Mark function lets you leave indicators on squares you aren't sure about, without risking a penalty.

Also, new Switch stylus controls allow you to switch input modes just by pressing the Circle Pad or +Control Pad once!

Picross is a "Picture Crossword Puzzle Game" where numbers act as hints to complete images.

The rules are simple and easy to grasp. Anyone can do it!

Source: The Game Website.

217320.description:
Halli Galli Party features gameplay similar to Halli Galli, which celebrates its 25th anniversary in 2017, but now the fruit is hosting a party and playing the instruments to keep things lively. Can you tell when there's a match on stage and react faster than anyone else?

To set up, deal the deck evenly among all players, with the cards showing musical strawberries, bananas and limes in different colors: yellow, green or red, with the fruits playing guitar, saxophone or drums. Taking turns, players flip one card from their deck face up in front of themselves. Whenever two face-up cards match in two properties, e.g., a yellow lime and a yellow strawberry both playing guitar, players race to ring the bell. Players also need to ring in quickly when the star of the Halli Galli band — the singing plum — takes the stage. Whoever rings in quickest takes all the face-up cards and places them under their deck; if someone rings at the wrong time, they must give one card from their deck to each other player.

As soon as only two players remain, the game ends after the next ringing of the bell, and whoever has the most cards wins!
217320.name: Halli Galli Party

217321.name: DEJA-VU
217321.description:
Forgetting something you saw only seconds earlier is one thing; remembering something that has never happened is the opposite experience. Both of these feelings come together in DEJA-VU, with players reacting to cards as they pass to grab repeated objects.

In more detail, the 36 object tiles are spread out around the deck of cards. These objects are each pictured on cards in the deck exactly twice. The cards in the deck are revealed one by one, and if you think that an object on a card has appeared previously, then you can grab the corresponding object tile and place it in front of you. Are you sure of what you saw? You better hope so because if a newly revealed card matches an object tile lying in front of you — and an opponent spots that tile in time and identifies your false memory — then you're out of the rest of the round.

Once you finish going through the deck, players score points for the items they collected. A total of three rounds are played, and with each subsequent round players might find it harder to remember exactly what they've seen. Was the object shown before, or am I thinking of the previous round? Whoever collects the most points after three rounds wins!

217322.name: Caramba
217322.description:
You want to grab the game figures in Caramba, but they can be grabbed away from you again if you're not quick enough to end the round.

Each player has five special dice that show black on three sides, blue on two, and red on one. At the start of each round, black, blue and red tokens are placed in the middle of the playing area, then everyone starts rolling their dice, rerolling whenever and whichever dice they desire. When they've met the goal — presumably having all of the dice the same color — they can grab that token from the center of the table or from whoever currently holds it. The rounds ends only after all tokens have been claimed and when someone knocks three times on the table. Whoever holds the black token advances their cube one space on the scoring track, while the blue and red tokens advance a cube two and three spaces respectively.

Whoever circles the scoring track first wins!

217323.name: Disney Tsum Tsum Mancala Super Stack
217323.description:
Description from the publisher:

It's a Tsum Tsum twist on Mancala! Move the beads around the board just like in the classic game, and use strategy to stack up matching Tsums for more points! Everything packs inside the snap-close board so you can play anywhere!

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217324.name: Fun Fair - Introduction
217324.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The Ahlissan Embassy has been opened officially some time ago in a ceremony that was closed to the general public. Now the ambassador has decided to organize a more public feast to celebrate the opening. The festivities will start with a tournament for adventurers and a fair for the general public. It will conclude with a feast meal and a dance. All adventurers are invited to join the festivities and have fun.

A Special for APL 2 to 12.

User summary:

This item provides the common introduction for all rounds of the adventure. Refer to the Fun Fair series for all components in the scenario.

217325.name: Fun Fair - Tournament
217325.description:
A Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

After a brief tour of the fair, PCs are gathered by Roban ApNaggen for the start of a special event: a tournament existing of four tests that will challenge brain and brawn.

217326.name: Fun Fair - The City
217326.description:
A Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The Ahlissan Embassy has been opened officially some time ago in a ceremony that was closed to the general public. Now the ambassador has decided to organize a more public feast to celebrate the opening. The festivities will start with a tournament for adventurers and a fair for the general public. It will conclude with a feast meal and a dance. All adventurers are invited to join the festivities and have fun.

A Special for APL 2 to 12.

217327.name: Fun Fair - The Embassy (APL 6)
217327.description:
A Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The Ahlissan Embassy has been opened officially some time ago in a ceremony that was closed to the general public. Now the ambassador has decided to organize a more public feast to celebrate the opening. The festivities will start with a tournament for adventurers and a fair for the general public. It will conclude with a feast meal and a dance. All adventurers are invited to join the festivities and have fun.

A Special for APL 2 to 12.

217328.name: Fun Fair - The Embassy (APL 4)
217328.description:
A Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The Ahlissan Embassy has been opened officially some time ago in a ceremony that was closed to the general public. Now the ambassador has decided to organize a more public feast to celebrate the opening. The festivities will start with a tournament for adventurers and a fair for the general public. It will conclude with a feast meal and a dance. All adventurers are invited to join the festivities and have fun.

A Special for APL 2 to 12.

217329.name: Bibi & Tina: Tohuwabohu Total
217329.description:
In Bibi & Tina: Tohuwabohu Total, the players play together with Bibi and Tina to successfully hide Adea from their relatives.

They have hidden cards in front of them, and during the course of the game, the players try to figure out which cards they have, then exchange bad cards for better ones. But they do not have unlimited time as the pursuers are on their heels. In order to win the game together, at the end of the game the value of the good cards of all players must be higher than the value of their bad cards.

217330.name: The Strayed
217330.description:
The main hero of the game a young guy Mr.J and his Mrs. are going to rest in a small island. But on the way the fall in the zone where Mrs.J is kidnapped by mysterious creatures, and Mr.J gets to the island, where he will find his Mrs. and save her from the evil creatures.

Source: The Developer Website.

217331.name: Schnapp die Nuss!
217331.description:
In the high treetops, bedtime was long ago, but the small squirrels are still jumping from tree to tree to gather as many nuts as possible. Now the squirrel mother is finally jumping after them to send them to bed.

Whoever gets hold of the most nuts in Schnapp die Nuss! by the time mom catches all of the little squirrels wins!

217332.name: Nuclear Contingency
217332.description:
User Summary

Nuclear Contingency is a top down action stealth game set during the height of the cold war.

217333.name: Word Killer: Zorgilonian Chronicles
217333.description:
User Summary

Word Killer: Zorgilonian Chronicles is an unusual mixture of a keyboard simulator and an arcade game.

217334.name: The Spirit Underneath
217334.description:
User Summary

The Spirit Underneath is a first-person horror game. You wake up in an unknown, creepy looking environment which you soon discover is hell. The problem?

217335.name: MyRummy 111
217335.description: The description of gameplay in MyRummy 111 requires only one sentence: Take a hand of unsorted cards, draw either a face-down or face-up card on your turn and put it in the right place, then place another card to the left or right of it. Your goal is to be the first to sort your cards in ascending or descending order, which is both easy and challenging since the cards have different qualities. Unfortunately, valuable cards rarely sit in the right place...

217336.name: Say Goodbye
217336.description:
User Summary

This visual novel about an ordinary man with his typical problems.

217337.name: Rites of Passage
217337.description:
From the introduction:

Rites of Passage is an "interlude" for a party of 4 to 6 1st-level characters (or alternately, 4-8 characters with NPC classes of levels 1 to 2). This is adventure is meant to introduce new characters to their first real combat encounter… and learn that all is not always what it seems.

217338.name: Mistkäfer
217338.description:
Description from the publisher:

Crap! This beetle has taken my dice from this row before I could exchange them for the winning baubles.

That's a refrain you'll often hear in the casual dice game Mistkäfer because if you don't score in time, the dice can be pilfered by other dung beetles, er, players.

217339.name: Sacred Shrine
217339.description:
From the introduction:

The town of Four Winds is small and located along the trading route between the city of Skykeep and Wallfort. Many caravans stop here along the trading route, therefore the town prospers during the summer and fall trading months. Without the caravans to help support the town Four Winds it would simply be a small hamlet with a few farms.
...
A Short Adventure for Four 2nd Level Characters.

217340.name: Raffzahn
217340.description:
The monsters are on the loose in Raffzahn, and they are keen on teeth. Do you feel the same way? If so, then grab the monsters with the most teeth, but watch your hands while you do since your fellow players want them, too!

Raffzahn is a quick-playing dice game in which you roll up to three times, grab monsters from opponents or the center of the table, and hope to have the most teeth when the game ends!

217341.name: The Underway
217341.description:
From the introduction:

The Underway comes to a narrow, stalagmite and stalagtite crowded bend. From the top of a square, black stone tower built into a stalagmite, a soft yellow light is cast upon the river. The sounds of the underworld have gone eerily silent as the party drifts through the long shadows cast over the river.

User summary:

A scenario for an experienced Dungeon Master.

217342.name: Imperio (Issue 1 - Oct 2016)
217342.description:
The first issue of Imperio.

Imperio is a 28-page, digest-sized print-only fanzine dedicated to Thousand Suns, a science fiction roleplaying game based on the SF of the 1950s, '60s, and '70s.

217343.name: Lair of Abrax the Skarily Evil
217343.description:
From the introduction:

A group of powerful adventurers have found the hideout of an evil mage, long thought to be dead, slain four years ago in Myth Drannor. His allies and henchmen seem to be of the lesser type, so a notice has gone up on the town noticeboard, giving the lairs location.

Thus, any would be adventurers could go and interfere with his evil plans by invading his evil den.

217344.name: Die Gärten von Versailles
217344.description: Who can make the most beautiful garden for the king in Die Gärten von Versailles? In each round are tiles on which pavilions, hedges, flower fields, or fountains can be seen. If you get the right tiles with the right cards, you can quickly build the largest contiguous areas in the garden and win the King's favor.

217345.name: Steading of the Hill Giant Chief Conversion
217345.description:
From the introduction:

All monsters and NPCs have been converted to conform to 3rd edition rules. I have included a few guidelines for handling the sleeping giants, which may be freely disregarded. The value of the money, gems, and jewelry in the module by has been reduced by about 75% to more closely fit the expected treasure by monster CR in 3rd edition. Most magic items are the same, though I’ve changed a few to conform to 3rd Edition.

User summary:

This is an unofficial, fan-created conversion to adapt G1: Steading of the Hill Giant Chief to Dungeons & Dragons (3rd Edition). The original scenario is required to use this product.

This item includes an RTF document and nine full-color GIF images (maps).

217346.name: The Accursed Tower Conversion Guide
217346.description:
User summary:

This is an unofficial, fan-created conversion to adapt The Accursed Tower to Dungeons & Dragons (3rd Edition). The original scenario is required to use this product.

217347.name: Codex of Rigal
217347.description:
From the introduction:

Tyresius has a book that tells of a powerful device that was used by the Elven Armada to fight off illithids and to control some of them as slave stock. The Rigal family of the ’ixmuzala clan were in charge of all magical and scientific experimenting and tried to breed mind-flayers with humanoid stock found on Freeden. Their goal was to design a decent anti-illithid shock troop.

User summary:

For high-level characters.

217348.name: The Dark Crypt
217348.description:
From the introduction:

The crypt is several hundred years old. Originally a burial chamber built by some long-forgotten race, it lay undisturbed for a couple of centuries. It was uncovered, opened, and stripped of its grave goods; then a group of bandits dug out a secret hideaway behind the original tombs. Other tenants moved in later. It is now occupied by a clutch of troglodytes, who use it as a place from which to stage raids on nearby human and elven settlements.

User summary:

For 2nd - 3rd level characters.

217349.name: Quest for the Silver Sword Conversion
217349.description:
From the introduction:

This adventure has been re-scaled to 3E for four characters of 3rd level. I have made Keshute the wererat into an adept to justify the many magical effects he has instituted in Barrik’s Keep, and have added some history to the story of Barrik himself (partly to explain why no one before Keshute has entered and cleared out the keep in the years since Barrik’s death). Other incidental details or explanations appear throughout.

User summary:

This is an unofficial, fan-created conversion to adapt Quest for the Silver Sword to Dungeons & Dragons (3rd Edition). The original scenario is required to use this product.

217350.name: The Keep
217350.description:
From the introduction:

The Keep is an old stone tower located in the hills a few miles from Talrinel, in a wilderness area where few people go. It was built by a spell-casting member of the aristocracy, but fell into ruin long ago—legend has it, after the lord of the castle went into an unexplained rage and murdered his entire household. It is now said to be haunted.

User summary:

For 2nd - 3rd level characters.

217351.name: Treasure of the Elements
217351.description:
From the introduction:

This is a game for 5th to 8th level characters. This module is played best with 6 players. You have been given role-playing notes and descriptive encounters so you can role-play with your game, making it more yours. Feel free to come up with a suitable backstory that you like. That way, this module can be a part of a long-running campaign or a stand-alone story. This booklet contains a village to work from, two new monsters, and several new magical items. All can be used in your own game.

User summary:

This scenario was created for play at EscapeCon 2004 in the "TunDell Tourney". It was distributed as four separate DOC-formatted documents:


A 30-page Scenario
A 7-page New Magic Items Appendix
A 6-page Players Handouts Appendix
A 7-page Dungeon Masters Appendix (Maps)

217352.description:
Desription from the publisher:

Amplified is an expansion for Thrash'n Roll game.

It makes gameplay smoother and much more intense. The expansion allows for 5-player games. Additionaly, it introduces new characters, which will help your band to reach the peak of their fame. Thanks to revised rules game becomes more intuitive and exciting.
217352.name: Thrash'n Roll: Amplified

217353.name: Assembly: Spaceship Builders
217353.description:
Description from the designer:

Assembly: Spaceship Builders is a quick, cooperative or solo, puzzle card game.

You control a production line for building spaceships. Unfortunately the factory designers have given you a very limited set of commands, the layout requirements keep changing and you have a tough deadline to meet. Can you complete the ship in time?

The game is played with a small deck of cards representing the commands you can use to control the machines, some cards that are the blueprints of the ship and some tokens that represent the rooms of the spaceship.

The game's objective is to place and lock the rooms into the their correct locations (given by the random allocation of the blueprint cards) before time runs out.

Overview of Play
1. Discard 1 Command card for its action OR discard 3 Command cards to perform any action.
2. Flip any locked locations and if required apply effects.
3. Draw Command Cards up to your hand limit (3 cards).
Note: The deck may be cycled a limited number of times. This acts as the timer.

To download a print & play version see https://boardgamegeek.com/thread/1644915/wip-assembly-spaces...

217354.description:
100 zombies in four different poses. These are the zombies included in Zombies!!! Third Edition.

The original Bag'O'Zombies (2003) (Zombies!!!: bag o' Zombies!!!) contained 100 figures just like the males in Zombies!!! First Edition.
217354.name: Zombies!!!: bag o' Zombies!!! Deluxe

217355.name: Together Balloon
boardgameintegration: 2gether
2gether
217355.description:
Game consists of cards with various tasks to be solved on time, all involving a balloon. All tasks have three levels of difficulty to be attempted, awarding 1-3 points. The first team to reach 10 points wins.

Can be played together with the original Together or alone.

217356.name: Redeemer!
rpg: The Way of the Tiger Gamebooks
217356.description:
From the back of the book:

"'I can provide you no solace from the obscenity that even now seeks to befoul your path along the spirit plane. Damnation or salvation, death or redemption, your fate awaits...'

You are trapped in the deepest darkness, far from the sunlit realm, but all is not yet lost. You may still find a way to free yourself from the web of Orb's greatest evil -- the Black Widow -- and rescue your friend Glaivas despite the malice of the countless deadly denizens of the Rift. To succeed in your journey back to the surface you will have to overcome the wrath of the gods of evil, to pass beyond even the spirit realm itself into legend, redeeming all that you have lost to the rotten heart of Orb. But what great evil has taken root in your home city whilst you have been away, bringing it to the very brink of disaster?

THE WAY OF THE TIGER is the role-playing adventure classic now revised and expanded for today. You choose the skills and martial arts moves to defeat your enemy, gaining knowledge and honing your abilities to use in further books.
Are you ready for the Way of the Tiger?"

217357.name: Horses and Mules
217357.description:
From publisher blurb:

Call to Arms: Horses & Mules contains information on how to more accurately use horses, mules and other equids for transport, roleplay information including a horse personality generator and glossary of horse colors, information on when and why you might want a mule rather than a horse as well as stats for new horse "types." You will also find horse-like monsters and mounts, and examples of "mythic" and "artifact" horses, some of them new to this book. It draws on real life horse knowledge as well as mythical horse-like creatures from around the world. Horses & Mules is for the GM who wants to make overland travel more realistic and a key part of the game as well as players of mount-focused classes, such as the Cavalier or Paladin. Horses are a vital part of Medieval-style and other low-tech settings and this book will help you do more with them than tie them up at the dungeon entrance and hope they are still there when you get back.

Information about horse physiology, psychology and health
New horse and mule types
New feats for both riders and mounts
Hussar (Cavalier variant class) and archetypes
New horse-like monsters and mounts
and more

217358.name: The Tidus Tomb (5E)
217358.description:
From publisher blurb:

In a small hamlet, things are strangly becoming tidy in the night. Far from being pleased, the citizens are alarmed by these events. A local painter has gone missing, as has a travelling scholar. What is going on here?

The Tidus Tomb is an adventure location for characters of 4th to 5th level. It is part of the Pyromaniac Press Encounters Series, which are short encounters, locations or scenarios designed to slot in easily to any ongoing campaign.

217359.name: The Tidus Tomb (Pathfinder)
217359.description:
From publisher blurb:

In a small hamlet, things are strangly becoming tidy in the night. Far from being pleased, the citizens are alarmed by these events. A local painter has gone missing, as has a travelling scholar. What is going on here?

The Tidus Tomb is an adventure location for characters of 4th to 5th level. It is part of the Pyromaniac Press Encounters Series, which are short encounters, locations or scenarios designed to slot in easily to any ongoing campaign.

217360.name: Race Options: Svirfneblin
217360.description:
From publisher blurb:

Race Options is a series of short PDFs that present new options for a specific player race.

In this volume:

New svirfneblin alternate racial traits.
2 new svirfneblin archetypes: Pick Master (Fighter) and Subterranean Druid (Druid)
New svirfneblin, equipment, magic items, feats and spells.

217361.name: Colonial Gothic Rulebook: Third Edition
217361.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Drums of War Sound

The great nations of Europe struggle for control of the New World. Native Americans struggle for their land and their lives. Planters and traders struggle for wealth and position. A new nation struggles to be born.

But look beneath the surface.

Monsters stalk the woods. Angry ghosts and spiteful witches plague the villagers. Explorers search for lost cities and fabled treasures. Ancient evils are awakened. There is a secret history, and this history deals with events that took place in the shadows. These events played a role in the history of the American colonies and the Revolution that few know about.

The truth is hidden, and plots are afoot. Events are moving behind the scenes, and lurking in the shadows are agents with their own agenda.

All have read about the founding of America. This history shows what led to the American Revolution and the cry for independence. The history is clear, and there is no real dispute over these events. You know the history.

Or do you?

There is a secret history that deals with events taking place in the shadows. These events played a role in the history of the American colonies and the Revolution few know about. From the crowded streets of New York City, to the deep country trails of Georgia, the shadows teem with enemies of conflicting agendas.

War is coming. The Siege of Boston is lifted, and General Washington is leading the Continental Army to New York. The enemies are many, but as to who they are, you do not know.

Colonial Gothic is a supernatural historical horror roleplaying game set during the dawn of the American Revolution.

Revised, rewritten and redesigned Colonial Gothic Rulebook 3rd Edition provides players and Gamemasters what they need to run adventures during the American Revolution. Everything you need to run a historical supernatural horror game is found in this book: rules covering the use of magic and alchemy, in-depth information on the life and times of the colonies, a bestiary of monsters pulled straight from the period; the possibilities are endless. Using a fast and simple mechanic, setting up and running a game of Colonial Gothic has never been easier. Plus, this 3rd Edition Rulebook is fully compatible with all previous Colonial Gothic adventures and sourcebooks.

Now the time has come.

War is here.

Choose your side.

217362.description:
Deep in the forests of the North lives an enchanting elf tribe called the Frogriders. Each spring, they hold a tournament in which their four major squads perform a mock battle. Whoever best manages to capture valuable units and make clever use of their special abilities will take the victory!

Frogriders is a tactical family game in which you collect the custom-molded plastic figures by making them leap over one another. Each of the collected Frogriders enables you to keep it for scoring or return it to the tribe's village in order to use its special ability. Due to the many different privilege cards and several scoring cards (of which only a few are used each game), there are a lot of tactical nuances to discover and many strategies to employ to win at Frogriders!
217362.name: Frogriders
boardgamepodcastepisode: 31. Devon Dice Podcast, 90% Meeples’ Corner Brown Nosing, 10% other

217363.name: Lost Tomb of the Dragon Knights
217363.description:
User Summary:

An introductory adventure for Classic Fantasy.

217365.description:
Schwarz Rot Gelb Extreme is a quick-playing pattern-building game — well, anti-pattern-building really. The game includes 80 symbol cards and 30 point cards; each symbol card features some number of symbols on it, with multiple types of symbols and multiple colors of symbols.

Shuffle the symbol cards, then spread them out on the table. Reveal as many points cards as the number of players. Each player takes a starting card and places it at the beginning of a row. Simultaneously, players start flipping over cards to find one that fits next to their rightmost card, with "fits" meaning that neither the number of symbols on the card nor the number of types of symbols nor the number of colors are repeated on the new card. If you draw a card that meets this description, add it to your row and draw again; if not, place it face-up on the table.

Once a player has seven cards in their row, they call "Stop!" All players check their card rows for errors, discarding any mistaken card and all cards played after it. The player with the longest row of cards claims the highest point card on display; the player with the second-longest row the next highest point card; and so on.

Shuffle the color cards for a new round of play. After five rounds, the player with the highest point total wins the game.
217365.name: Schwarz Rot Gelb Extreme

217366.name: Farkle Around
217366.description: Flip over your first card to show what dice combination you are trying to match. Each card has two identical dice combinations, one for burgundy dice and one for ivory dice. Roll your set of dice, then set aside those that match the card and continue rolling the rest. But if none of them match what is needed, you "Farkle" and play passes to the next player. When someone matches the card, they earn the points on the card. The game continues with new cards until someone reaches 10,000 points.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217367.name: The Dragon Roars
217367.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Interactive Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

When the earth shakes, and danger prowls the land, all are best safe and snug inside. But you can’t curb youth’s curiosity. A innocent trick pulled may look like a game, but this is not child’s play!

A mini-scenario set in Deltrees for APL 2-8.

Most suitable for halflings, members of the Iron Band Contraband Cartel, and those favored by Tasali Bregohan (but playable by all).

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217368.name: The Angel's Share
217368.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Interactive

From the introduction:

In Pitchfield, the capital of Sunndi, there's a shady tavern called the Pit. Usually its infamous owner Makarios organizes pit fights there, but he has planned something different for tonight...

A one-round Sunndi Reginonal Interactive for characters level 1-16 (APLs 2-14).

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217369.name: Muddied Affairs: Scouting the Swamps
217369.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The enemy is on the march! Whether they have set their sights on Eyedrinn, New Keep or Pitchfield matters not, for the Sunndian forces are not ready. A disrupting attack on the Wastrian command position deep in the vast swamp seems to be the final chance to veer away from the certainty of defeat. Yet no army can march through the swamp unseen to assault the fortified monasteries. What choice does Sunndi have but to once again clamor to the soon to be heroes. Only adventurers stand, however small, a chance to turn this tide.

A 3 round Sunndi Special for levels 2 - 12 set in the Vast Swamp.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217370.name: Muddied Affairs: Fortress of the Dark Toad
217370.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The enemy is on the march! Whether they have set their sights on Eyedrinn, New Keep or Pitchfield matters not, for the Sunndian forces are not ready. A disrupting attack on the Wastrian command position deep in the vast swamp seems to be the final chance to veer away from the certainty of defeat. Yet no army can march through the swamp unseen to assault the fortified monasteries. What choice does Sunndi have but to once again clamor to the soon to be heroes. Only adventurers stand, however small, a chance to turn this tide.

A 3 round Sunndi Special for levels 2 - 12 set in the Vast Swamp.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217371.name: Muddied Affairs: Wastri's Wishy Washy Worshippers
217371.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Special

From the introduction:

The enemy is on the march! Whether they have set their sights on Eyedrinn, New Keep or Pitchfield matters not, for the Sunndian forces are not ready. A disrupting attack on the Wastrian command position deep in the vast swamp seems to be the final chance to veer away from the certainty of defeat. Yet no army can march through the swamp unseen to assault the fortified monasteries. What choice does Sunndi have but to once again clamor to the soon to be heroes. Only adventurers stand, however small, a chance to turn this tide.

A 3 round Sunndi Special for levels 2 - 12 set in the Vast Swamp.

217372.description: In El Dorado, players slip into the roles of expedition leaders who have embarked on a search for the legendary land of gold in the dense jungles of South America. Each player assembles and equips their own team, hiring various helpers from the scout to the scientist to the aborigine. All of them have but one goal in mind: Reaching the golden border first and winning all of the riches for themselves. Whoever chooses the best tactics will be rewarded!
217372.name: Wettlauf nach El Dorado

217373.name: Monopoly: Brisbane Edition
217373.description:
Description from the publisher:

We’ve seen the cities of Sydney, Perth, Adelaide and Melbourne all immortalised with their own MONOPOLY City Edition, and this year sees the launch of Brisbane Monopoly!

With seven million visitors each year, Australia’s new World City has a reputation as a fantastic lifestyle city, which will be played out in the world’s favourite game.

The spirit and shape of this customised edition will remain the same as the traditional game, but now you will be able to buy and own your favourite Brisbane suburbs and landmarks! There will also be lots of twists and changes too, including Brisbane-themed Community Chest and Chance cards

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217374.name: Unexpected Enemies
217374.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Regional Special

From the introduction:

With the lines of war drawn clearly across Sunndian soil things seem black and white. Good or bad, friend or foe, easy distinctions to make in such threatening times. Help is on its way from an expected source, but what if some fail to see it thus? Will adventurers once more shine their light into the darkness and clean away the sorrow?

A 2-round regional special set in the kingdom of Sunndi - part battle interactive, part mini-adventure for levels 1 to 10.

Part of the Bullywugs War series.

217375.name: One Too Many Kobolds
217375.description:
From the publishers blurb:

Too Many Kobolds is a stand alone adventure and can be set in any small hamlet or town, however, there is some information about the town of Coventon if the GM wishes to use it. There is also information on notable NPCs, The Mayor of Coventon, Taran,, the Tavern Short Stack and its Halfling owner Midas, as well as the local Priestess, Nivina. A few sites in the town are also named but much is left open for the GM to define as he wishes.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217376.name: Battle Fatigue
217376.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Mini-Scenario set in or near Pitchfield

From the introduction:

The Battle of Pitchfield has raged leaving behind a ravaged land and battle weary soldiers regardless of victory or loss. Surveying the recent destruction, because no battle leaves the land untouched, the heroes get to set the first steps into restoring hope of those who survived and see a nation take its next steps into an uncertain future.

A 1-round mini-adventure set in or nearby Pitchfield for character levels 1 to 15.

User summary:

This scenario has the following sections:


Battle Fatigue - Alone (Levels 2 - 8)
Battle Fatigue - United (Levels 10 - 14)

217377.name: Von Deutschland nach Amerika mit unseren Handels-U-Booten
217377.description:
This WWI German game has a really unusual theme. Clearly published after the start of the war but before the entry of the United States, it is based on the idea of trading with America by using underwater freighters.

In game terms, it is a simple roll-and-move affair for up to six players. There are assorted spaces that cause delays or setbacks as well as a few that allow players to take money from the pot. The first player to complete a round trip from Bremen to the U.S. and back is told to shout "Hurra!" three times and take half the pot. The remainder is split by the rest of the players.

The game has art by Siegmund von Suchdolski, with a cover showing a winged Hermes head in a rising sun over a surfaced U-boat, and the board featuring images of a U-boat engine room and of U-boats in harbor, underway and being loaded with bales of goods.

boardgamedesigner: Masakazu Takizawa (たきざわ まさかず)
217378.name: BABEL
boardgameartist: Masakazu Takizawa (たきざわ まさかず)
217378.description:
User summary
BABEL is a balancing game where players make a tower of paper by building walls of different heights. This game has three modes of play: hidden identity mode (saboteurs may exist), limited communication co-operative mode (players may not speak words), and random co-operative mode (players may not choose walls).

In hidden identity mode, players are secretly assigned a role: Builder or Saboteur. A Builder's goal is to build an eight-tier tower, and a Saboteur's goal is to make one of the builders collapse the tower.

Each player has three cards in their hand. In your turn, you place a floor card, which is numbered 1-5, face-up, and other players place a floor card face-down, saying a hint (saboteurs might be misleading you). Then you reveal one of these face-down card, combine it with yours to make a hexagonal floor, and take two walls that correspond to floor numbers. You must place the floor and the walls on top of tower without making it collapse. Height of walls gradually vary over floor numbers, so you should pick the same number if you want to build an upright tower.

If you are a saboteur, it's up to you whether you secretly or explicitly betray the builders. You may try to mislead builders to take unbalanced walls, or boldly build up a skewed tower in your turn. But beware. Your side loses the game if you make the tower collapse yourself. You may also reveal your identity during your turn, in which case builders need to complete one more floor to win the game.

The game can be played as a solitaire but only in random mode. You randomly take two floor cards and use the corresponding walls to build one tier. Repeat the process until you build 12-tier tower without it falling.

There is an instructional manga by 七色洋品店 (Nanairo Youhinten) which is on the Game Market webpage for the game (see links below).

Publisher's summary
BABELは不揃いの高さの壁カードを積み上げ塔を完成させるバランスゲームです。裏切り者が暗躍する正体隠匿モード、神話の後日談を楽しむ母語が使えなくなる完全協力モード、ランダムに壁カードを積む髪の戯れモード、1パッケージで3つのモードが楽しめます。　●正体隠匿モード●　人数＋１枚の人格カードを配り、建設者(建てたい人)狂信者(壊したい人)を決定します。床カード5種を各3枚配り、手番プレイヤーはその中から1枚を表にして出します。他のプレイヤーは一言そえて裏向きにカードを出します。手番プレイヤーはその中から1枚選び床カードを組み合わせ1枚にし、対応する、高さの違う壁カード(5種類あります)をそれぞれの床の上にのせます。8段積めたら建設者の勝ち、塔を崩したらその陣営の負けになります。また、狂信者は自分の手番に正体を明かすことで、完成段数を1段上げることができます。

217379.name: Der Landvogt und die fraechen Luegner
217379.description:
The card game is based on Frank Bebenroth's Drecksau. It's settled in a small historical Swiss town a couple of centuries ago. People want to have fun playing games, but games are forbidden. You're trying to play secretly at home. If the reeve knocks on your door, you better send your mother to prevent him from coming in. But if it's the priest, he'll come in anyway...

You have 3 or 5 two-sided character cards in front of you. They start on the grey (not playing) side. If you are the first player to turn all your cards to the coloured (playing) side, you win the game.

You have 3 activity cards on your hand. They allow you to turn your or the others' character cards, to protect your cards, or to remove protection from the others.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217380.name: Trouble from Above
217380.description:
A Living Greyhawk Sunndi Mini-Module Adventure

From the introduction:

With autumn knocking on the door, preparations for the celebrations in honour of Commandant Osson's victory over Ivid's forces 11 years ago are well on its way. These celebrations, also known as the Festival of Freedom, are held all over Sunndi and are mainly a good excuse for drinking and dancing.

User summary:

For 2nd - 10th level characters.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217381.name: Rain
217381.description:
A Living Greyhawk Sunndi Mini-Module Adventure

From the introduction:

Weeks of rain have swamped the roads and made travel difficult - for people, anyway. Rumours of monsters abound, and both adventure and a quick coin should be easy to find.

User summary:

For 1st - 8th level characters.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217382.name: Spring Cleaning
217382.description:
A Living Greyhawk Sunndi Mini-Module Adventure

From the introduction:

Spring is a good time for fairs, markets, and similar festivities, even for the sober dwarves. All winter they have worked in their forges to create metal marvels, and now, they bring their creations into the light, for sale.

User summary:

For 2nd - 10th level characters.

See also SND5-01I: Spring Cleaning

217383.name: Dark Deeds: Gen Con 2016 Promo
217383.description:
Promo Item from Gen Con 2016

Contents:

10 Cards:
1 New Nemesis
1 New Plot card
1 New x2 Merchant loot cards (2 cards)
2 New x2 Artisan Loot Cards (4 cards)
1 D20 Dice

217384.description:
User summary
A small expansion for Sly Knight Robbery introduces a pair of pigs to help the Sly Knights recover stolen items. Each player gets a card with two pigs, to use as a neutral no.2 played on stolen item cards.
217384.name: Sly Knight Robbery: Detective Team Pig & Pig

217385.description:
Beyond Space and Time! Bonded to a mysterious creature called an eidolon, the summoner’s true power lies in what he and his eidolon can accomplish together. The Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Summoner Class Deck allows Balazar and 2 other characters, including Alase Brinz-Widowknife from the Pathfinder Tales novel "King of Chaos," to explore the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game.

This 109-card accessory holds a bevy of new spells and other goodies to take your summoner through an entire Adventure Path. This deck can also be used in the Pathfinder Society Adventure Card Guild organized play campaign.
217385.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Class Deck - Summoner

217386.description: This is an expansion to the game Имаджинариум (Imaginarium) which adds 97 new cards.
217386.name: Imaginarium: Pandora

217387.description: An expansion to Имаджинариум (Imaginarium) which which adds 97 new cards.
217387.name: Imaginarium: Ariadne

217388.name: Guild of the Fallen
217388.description:
Description from the publisher:

Guild of the Fallen is an adventure dice worker placement racing game where players lead guilds of adventurers seeking vengeance for their fallen heroes.

The spirits of past heroes linger in the guild halls until their revenge is secured. These spirits can inhabit the bodies of novice adventurers to share their knowledge and abilities. The first player to defeat their guilds nemesis wins the game.

The game begins with each player getting a random nemesis quest which is kept secret. Players then proceed to draft their guilds starting hero spirits. Players are given a number of dice relative to the hero types drafted. There are four types of dice used which are distinguished by their colors: red for Might, blue for Magic, white for Faith, and black for Deceit. The dice will act as the novice adventurers and can be used as ‘workers’ to activate various spaces on the board. They can also be used to activate the hero spirit cards, enabling hero abilities while on an adventure.

Adventures must be completed in order to unlock access to a player's nemesis, which would be their final quest to win the game. Each adventure can be attempted by multiple players and will likely help more than one player get closer to unlocking their quest. An adventure consists of staged pattern matching from dice rolls and any augmentations from heroes or items to complete.

There’s a single resource in the game called essence. Essence can be acquired from successful adventures and be used to unlock hero abilities, gain new heroes, and to purchase or upgrade equipment.

The nemesis quest will need to be completed solo and will require a lot of preparation and some luck to defeat. Similar to adventures, the quests will consist of more difficult pattern matching from dice rolls and various augmentations. Be the first to complete your nemesis quest and earn the honor that your guilds fallen heroes deserve.

217389.name: The Subterranean Monarch
217389.description:
From publisher blurb:

In this installment:

AN UNDERGROUND EMPIRE!

A MERCENARY ARMY!

A TERRIFYING DESPOT!

WHAT LURKS BELOW...

“Oh, yes, my children! Like you, I have been hunted. Like you, my birthright was lost to misadventure and folly. While you toiled in darkness, deep beneath the surface, you lost your way. You forgot your illustrious history! And above you, weak-minded simpletons have forged kindoms that are but pale imitations of your forebears. They have grown fat and decadent, and are unworthy of their purloined place in the sun.

“But no more! I will restore your kingdom. I will rule. And I will nally reap the rewards owed to me...and elevate you back to your rightful glory!

“Woe betide any who stand against the Subterranean Monarch! Forward, my Mantle Men! Forward to victory, in the name of your god-king!”

217390.name: RC Mini Racers
217390.description:
RC Mini Racers is a fast paced and explosive racing game with 18 remote controlled mini cars, lots of missiles and mines, turbos for an extra boost as well as great hard rock music. 3 cars are free and another 15 cars can be unlocked within the game. The car pimp shop lets you customize you RC car by changing the color, the wheels and the antenna.

The game features 24 tracks separated in circuit races (round tracks with 5 laps) and sprint races (A to B races, no rules, as fast as possible). Beside that there’s a coin racing mode where you can explore the level and collect coins for the in-game store. RC Mini Racers has a great mixture of tracks where you need your weapons to win the race by shooting and bombing your opponents from the track but also fantastic high speed tracks where it is mostly down to great driving skills to win the race. Find out yourself which tracks you like most!

For nearly every action during a race you get in-game cash rewarded. You get cash for crashing other cars, explosions caused by missiles and mines that affect other cars, for jumping over epic ramps and getting airtime cash, for driving best laps and best race times as well as for winning the top spot ranks in a race. Use that in-game cash to unlock other tracks or convert them to coins for use in the car pimp shop.

All tracks can be raced in 4 difficulty modes ranging from easy to medium over to hard and finally the insane mode. Hours of fun guaranteed until you unlocked all tracks in all difficulty modes!

RC Mini Racers runs in any native resolution your Windows or Mac PC offers – in windowed and fullscreen mode. Graphics settings can be adjusted and tweaked in detail to let the game run perfectly on your machine. Any Joypad or Joystick as well as the keyboard can be used to control your car.

Still reading? What are you waiting for? Get the game and start your engine!

Source: The Publisher Website.

217391.name: Divergent Paths: Medic
217391.description:
From publisher blurb:

Divergent Paths offers new character options for the Path of War martial maneuver system of combat! In this first release, the medic class is introduced. The medic offers combat healing options to the maneuver system from Path of War.

Included in this 13-page PDF you will find:

The medic class
The ambu-lancer, angel of mercy, sanguinist archetypes, and witch doctor archetypes
New feats
New magic items

217392.name: Coming of Age
217392.description:
From publisher blurb:

How can you add more character focus and a slice of life to your adventures?

Story Design Volume 13 - In a coming of age plot, the protagonist gains maturity. This is often literal as the character moves from one stage of their life to another, like from childhood to adolescence, or young adulthood to middle age. It can be metaphorical as they embark on a new career, learn to live alone after a long relationship, or discover how to function without some resource no longer available to them. By the end of a coming of age story, the protagonist has mastered some aspect of their life, taken control of their destiny, and come fully into their own.

Examples of the coming of age plot include Great Expectations, Huckleberry Finn, Jane Eyre, To Kill a Mockingbird, and A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man.

217393.name: Themiscyra
217393.description:
A territorial game for 2 players, Black and White

Materials
10x10 board
a supply of black and white stones
8 neutral rings

Definitions
Adjacent - means orthogonally and/or diagonally adjacent

Open Area - two or more contiguous empty spaces on the board

Object
Player with the largest connected unbroken chain of friendly adjacent stones wins

Setup
Board starts out empty

Starting with Black turns then alternate

Within a straight line of orthogonal or diagonal empty spaces place two friendly stones and then place a ring over one of these two stones

This continues until all 8 rings are on the board

Play
Starting with Black turns then alternate

Within a straight line of orthogonal or diagonal empty spaces place two friendly stones, then move a ring onto one of these two stones

Restrictions
You may only move a ring from a friendly stone

The ring you choose to move and the stone the ring is to be placed over must be adjacent to the same open area

Clarifications
The two stones placed on a single turn must not have any other stones between them

A ring can only be moved through an open area that it is adjacent to

A ring that is not adjacent to an open area cannot be moved

End of Game
The game ends when a player is unable to complete his turn

217394.name: The Grapeshot Express
217394.description:
From publisher blurb:

An absurdist adventure for nearly any system, contains notes on a large campaign along with quests and mini quests for each magor locale. Some assembly required as this does not contain system-specific information.

217395.name: The Place of Forgetting
217395.description:
From publisher blurb:

An adventure for characters leveled 3 and up, written for AD&D/OSR games, this campaign will allow the players to explore the land of Ubliet, which has fallen under a demonic curse. Loaded with location notes and a bestiary of new creatures, this game has everything a GM needs to flesh out a horror adventure.

217396.name: Wakened Wilderness
217396.description:
From publisher blurb:

For use with Advanced Dungeons & Dragons or any of its clones; allows players and GMs to play games with settings similar to the Redwall novels by Brian Jacques. Within are simple templates for different woodland "races" as well as simple conversion rules for things like monsters and magic.

217397.name: The Big Book of Randomness
217397.description:
From publisher blurb:

A big list of randomization tables for making a random campaign. Useful mainly for new Game Masters in need of creativity prompts for their adventures, especially when building a world from scratch!

217398.description:
The Realms lay divided, their former wonder lost and forgotten. The Tyrant Queen has seized the throne, forcing the rightful heirs deep into exile. You are the sons and daughters of the once-great houses: Foxway, Gorga, Mherzeen, and Spyre. Under the tutelage of advisors, you have gathered your followers, your conscripts. The time has come to take back what is yours.

Path of Light and Shadow is a massive empire-building experience, combining area control, deck management, and civilization customization. As players vie for control of The Realms, they must enlist and promote supporters, outfit their burgeoning empire with powerful technologies, align with powerful leaders, and lay siege to rival exiles after the throne. Above all else, each player must decide what type of leader they will become, cruel or merciful. But choose wisely, for each path has its rewards and perils.
217398.name: Path of Light and Shadow

217399.name: Knights of Camelot
217399.description:
You are a Lord of Camelot and the only thing standing in the way between you and the empty Throne are your unworthy opponents.

Play your hand of 4 cards with a skillful mixture of trickery and bluff to secure the support of more Knights of the Round Table than your rivals in order to claim yourself ruler of Camelot.

With a poker face worthy of a King use the abilities of the Cardinal, Seer, Champion and Poisoner to protect your position and hinder your contenders--who of course will be trying to do the same to you!

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217400.name: Midsummer Nightmare (Low Level)
217400.description:
A Three-round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Adventure

Low Level - Version B

From the introduction:

There are not many reasons for a celebration in Sunndi, but the Hollow Highlanders are not about to let the outside world disrupt their traditions. When it is time for the Clanmoot, it is time for a Clanmoot, especially since one is only held once every 5 years. Still, in dangerous times, one needs skilled guardians and who better to select then adventurers?

A 3-round special for APL 2 to 8.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217401.name: Midsummer Nightmare (High Level)
217401.description:
A Three-round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Adventure

High Level - Version C

From the introduction:

There are not many reasons for a celebration in Sunndi, but the Hollow Highlanders are not about to let the outside world disrupt their traditions. When it is time for the Clanmoot, it is time for a Clanmoot, especially since one is only held once every 5 years. Still, in dangerous times, one needs skilled guardians and who better to select then adventurers?

A 3-round special for APL 10+.

217402.name: Williams Pokémon Game
217402.description:
The goal is to gather the most Pokémons of different sets, for an example grass, water, or psycic Pokémons.

You do this by taking turns throwing a 1d6 and a 1d12 die. You sum up the result and take a avaible Pokémon card from a grid of cards with that number.

Once per turn you can evolve your Pokémons if you have the criterias to do so, which means you can swap your Pokémon card for a more powerful version.

You do this until the draw piles are depleted. Then, each player sum up each set and compare. The winner of a set gets a point. The player with the most points is the winner.

217403.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Dungeons of Cirith Gurat is the fifth Adventure Pack in the Haradrim cycle for The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game.

With its sixty cards (including a new Lore hero and three copies of each player card), The Dungeons of Cirith Gurat finds several of Middle-earth's greatest heroes hundreds of miles from home, traveling through the hostile realm of Harad. They have crossed deserts, tamed Mûmakil, fled from Orcs on Wargs, and tunneled through a den of giant spiders. They have ambushed a caravan loaded with tithes meant for the Dark Lord of Mordor. And they have made allies along their way.

For much of their homeward journey, the heroes have been accompanied and assisted by the small band of Haradrim led by Kahliel (The Mûmakil, 1) and his lieutenants. Together, they have survived the perils of Harad's jungles and deserts. They have fought together and bled together, so when Kahliel learns that his tribesmen are being held prisoner in the "Iron Pass" of Cirith Gurat, the heroes don't hesitate to volunteer their swords. Their friends will be freed.

While the scenario from The Dungeons of Cirith Gurat leads your heroes deep into one of the Dark Lord's prisons, its player cards arm you for the battles to come. Once you spring Kahliel's tribesmen from prison, you'll need to fight your way free of Orc jailors and pursuers, and you'll be happy for the assistance of the Adventure Pack's new Weapons, Warriors, and events.
217403.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game - The Dungeons of Cirith Gurat
boardgamefamily: Lord of the Rings: The Card Game (LCG)

217404.name: Pungi
217404.description:
Description from the publisher:

Snake-catching made easy! In the card game Pungi, everybody knows what kinds of animals each player has in their hand, but they don't know the number values. The rewards you can earn are displayed in the middle of the table. Is it a good idea to go catching snakes together with another player – or is it better to try it alone?

With your animal cards, try to lure the most valuable snakes without attracting too many poisonous ones. Snake charmers can be of some help turning negative points into positive ones at the end of the game — but if you don’t have any negative points, the snake charmer will turn your positive points into negative points! Whoever has the most points at the end of the game wins.

rpgseries: URC3 - County of Urnst Season Three
217405.name: Women and Children First! Conversion
217405.description:
User summary:

This brief document provides errata to convert COU3-05: Women and Children First! from Dungeons & Dragons (3rd Edition) to Dungeons & Dragons (3.5 Edition).

rpgseries: URC - Living Greyhawk County of Urnst Regional Adventures
URC6 - County of Urnst Season Six
217406.name: Whose Cuisine Reigns Supreme
217406.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure set in the County of Urnst

From the introduction:

Earlier this year, a man’s vision came to fruition. He desired to encounter new cooking styles and new tastes. To that end, he invested his fortune and his reputation to create an arena where chefs from all over the Flanaess would come to Radigast city and challenge the top chefs in the County. This competition spanning several days requires more than simple culinary skills. Chefs from many nations have gathered in the Radigast Cuisine Academy. The heat will be on!

A one-round adventure set in County of Urnst for characters level 1-10 (APLs 2-8).

217407.description: This set of 3 cardboard tokens was originally available as a reward for backers of the 2014 Dicetower Kickstarter. It can be played with either Rumble in the House or Rumble in the Dungeon.
217407.name: Rumble in the House/Dungeon: Dice Tower 2014 promo

217408.name: Fort Jorvive: Lupine Confusion
217408.description:
A Living Greyhawk Mini-Scenario

Fort Jorvive
The Shield
"Lupine Confusion"

From the introduction:

The [characters] are assigned as gate guards, responsible for checking the credentials and cargo of everyone going in and out of the Fort.

User summary:

This concise adventure does not have a region or year code and lacks the common formatting found on virtually all Living Greyhawk scenarios.

217409.description:
This Promo card was originally available as a reward for backing the 2014 Dice Tower Kickstarter campaign.

"En Sabah Nur"
Mastermind

Four Horsemen Villains get +2

En Sabah Nur Wins: When Famine, Pestilence, War, and Death have escaped.

Always Leads: Four Horsemen

Master Strike: Each player reveals their hand and puts all their Heroes that cost 1 or more on top of their deck.
217409.name: Legendary: Dark City – En Sabah Nur Promo

217410.description:
This promo was originally available as a reward for backing the 2014 Dice Tower Kickstarter Campaign.

"Tom Vasel"

If you have not been eliminated by the end of the game, you are the only one who wins. -3
217410.name: Ultimate Werewolf: Deluxe Edition – Tom Vasel Promo

rpgseries: URD - Living Greyhawk Duchy of Urnst Regional Adventures
URD8 - Duchy of Urnst Season Eight
217411.name: The Allies of My Enemies (Act 1)
217411.description:
A Two-In-One-Round Living Greyhawk Regional Interactive

From the introduction:

Each of you, individually, are contacted by a mysterious messenger, requesting your presence at what sounds like a secret meeting of grave importance to future of the Duchy.

217412.description:
This promo pack was originally available as a reward for backing the 2015 Dice Tower Kickstarter Campaign.

"The characters on these cards represent famous personalities in the board gaming world: Tom Vasel and Eric Summerer (The Dice Tower), Scott Alden (Boardgamegeek.com), and Monsieur Phal and Docteur Mops (Trictrac.net).

Now you can play Robin with these board game luminaries! Swap these cards with normal game cards that have the same arrow patterns. Enjoy the meta-fun!
217412.name: Robin: Promo Card Pack

rpgseries: URD - Living Greyhawk Duchy of Urnst Regional Adventures
URD8 - Duchy of Urnst Season Eight
217413.name: The Allies of My Enemies (Act 2)
217413.description:
A Two-In-One-Round Living Greyhawk Regional Interactive

From the introduction:

The clamor of battle fades, and Karll’s strike force patches up their wounds as cheers of victory erupt.

The emotional peak soon turns downward, as one of Karll’s scouts spots something amiss.

"To the west!" he shouts. "It's Atherlea... in flames!"

rpgseries: TUS - Living Greyhawk Tusmit Regional Adventures
217414.name: La Chicane dans le Voisinage
217414.description:
A Tusmit Interactive, played only at Sherbycon 19-20 July 2003.

From the introduction:

The story is about Haricot 'Hari' Homus who contacts the [characters] as they are relaxing at an Inn. He is having a problem with his neighbor Raisin 'Ray' Harissa. He wants outside help to prove Ray's guilt.

rpgseries: TUS - Living Greyhawk Tusmit Regional Adventures
217415.name: Visite Divine
217415.description:
From the introduction:

Djev Grummsh-Fist, a shaman of a small orc tribe received a vision from his god. In it he saw the local countryside aflame and his tribe ruling over the land. All he had to do was offer to Grummsh a large number of cattle. He approached his warlord and told him of the dream. Burj the Mighty, then began moving his troops and attacked the local human settlements.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217416.name: Land of Confusion: Meeting the Messenger
217416.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Adventure

From the introduction:

Ribbit! Ribbit! Once the sign of a peaceful night, now a harbinger of disaster, the Sunndians are quickly learning to detest and fear the sound of frogs, especially when its source takes on the horrid form of a bloated bullywug! Fair Sunndi is being invaded by an army from the Vast Swamp, led by Wastrian racists. Now is the time for heroes everywhere to spring to the fore and come protect the good people of the land! Come! One and all! The need is high!

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217417.name: Land of Confusion: The Anvil
217417.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Battle Interactive

From the introduction:

Returning from their missions during the night, the [characters] are ushered to their posts at the battlefield and introduced to the men under their command. There is not much time before a flock of bat-like creatures fly high over, and the first bullywugs appear on the horizon.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217418.name: Land of Confusion: The Eastern Wall
217418.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Battle Interactive

From the introduction:

Ribbit! Ribbit! Once the sign of a peacefull night, now a harbinger of disaster, the Sunndians are quickly learning to detest and fear the sound of frogs, especially when its source takes on the horrid form of a bloated bullywug! Fair Sunndi is being invaded by an army from the Fast Swamp, led by Wastrian racists. Now is the time for heroes everywhere to spring to the fore and come protect the good people of the land! Come! One and all! The need is high!

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217419.name: Land of Confusion: The Hammer
217419.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Battle Interactive

From the introduction:

After a briefing early the previous evening, and some action during the night, the real action is finally to begin.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217420.name: Land of Confusion: Interactive
217420.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Interactive

From the introduction:

People gather in a common room, where they have some time to meet and greet, until the commanders for this battle appear, accompanied by count Kestor, as well as his chaplan, a man named Jezven Goodheart.

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217421.name: Land of Confusion: The Door
217421.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Battle Interactive

From the introduction:

Ribbit! Ribbit! Once the sign of a peacefull night, now a harbinger of disaster, the Sunndians are quickly learning to detest and fear the sound of frogs, especially when its source takes on the horrid form of a bloated bullywug! Fair Sunndi is being invaded by an army from the Vast Swamp, led by Wastrian racists. Now is the time for heroes everywhere to spring to the fore and come protect the good people of the land! Come! One and all! The need is high!

rpgseries: SND - Living Greyhawk Sunndi Regional Adventures
217422.name: Land of Confusion: The Western Wall
217422.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Sunndi Special Battle Interactive

From the introduction:

After a briefing early the previous evening, and some action during the night, the real action is finally to begin. With the rising of the sun, the march of the bullywugs has begun.

217423.name: Cosmic Run: Rapid Fire
217423.description:
It is 2456 and the planet Earth has long been abandoned. The remaining humans in existence, divided into political factions, have been in search of a new home. Only two factions remain. As they race toward new hospitable worlds, they are not only battling each other, but a hostile alien race that is trying to sabotage their ships with space mines. Will your team make it to the planets to establish new colonies?

Cosmic Run: Rapid Fire is a standalone, 1-2 player sequel to Cosmic Run. It's a quicker, yet more aggressive game because it includes direct attacks on your opponent. It is also a very portable game consisting of just ten dice and score sheets.

217424.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Japanese clans are lost without the tenno's favor. In the card game Tenno, a clan that is able to capture many rivals improves its prestige at court and can strengthen its influence. Players provoke fights and attack each other tactically. Man against man, card against card: Who is the next to compete, and who has been clandestinely replaced during the game?
217424.name: Tenno

217425.name: Connect 4 Card Game
217425.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Connect 4 card game brings added dimensions to the classic 4-in-a-row contest. Wild colours give more choice, and power up actions and secret missions ramp up the challenge for your colourful connections!

On your turn draw a Connect 4 tile and place it next to a tile already in play. Making the patterns shown on your secret mission cards completes them. The first player to complete 4 missions wins.

Some cards conation power ups that may allow players to take a second action on their turn and alter the tiles already in play.

Download the shuffle card app to add an extra element to the game.

217426.name: Welt der 90er Jahre
217426.description:
Description from the publisher:

The 1990s – was that your time? In the game Welt der 90er Jahre, use your knowledge of which song is considered the hymn of the German reunification, what was fashionable, and what Karl Klammer was all about. In this game, you learn everything around the world of the 1990s in a playful way. Answer questions about fashion, sports, movies and TV, music, literature, and politics. Who was the world champion of Formula One? What was heroin chic? What scandal was unearthed about Milli Vanilli?

217427.name: Brigadier General Commands
217427.description:
World War II Strategy Wargame For 6mm Scale Models

These war-game rules for Second World War battles are designed for re-creating historical battles with miniatures in 1/300 or 1/285 scale. The size of forces on each side are typically a combat command or brigade. Such battles were frequently commanded by Brigadier Generals, hence the name of the rules. Some of the most interesting battles you can play with these rules have a number of commands on each side, each directed by a different player.

These wargame rules were written primarily for play with two or more players, however the rules were specifically designed for the possibility of solo play. Starting from a historical set up, if you play alone, you will find the command rules make it easy to be logical about what orders should be given to each side.

The game includes the rules book, two summary rule sheets, armor penetration table sheet, ready to cut order chits and unit identification markers. Optional extra time and event cards can be purchased separately, which facilitate play and speed the game.

217428.description:
Description from the publisher:

With Rory's Story Cubes: Fantasia, you can tell stories of thrilling and magical creatures. Let the Story Cubes roll and use the diced icons to spin a fantastic fable. The only rule: there are no wrong answers.

This box includes the three-dice sets Enchanted, Myths and Medieval

This expansion can be played on its own or in combination with other Rory's Story Cube sets.
217428.name: Rory's Story Cubes: Fantasia

217430.description:
This is a 2 player deckbuilding game, occuring during the Antiquity. Each player represent Athen or Sparta and are fighting in order to erase the opponent city.

Will you cast meteors, unleash the Cerberus or ask Achillus to raise an army ?

How to win ?
Each player has a city (Athen or Sparta), split into 4 areas. Once all the areas of the opponent city are destroyed, then you win the game !

How to play ?

Each player turn follow the same 3 steps :
1) Attack Phase
2) Play Phase
3) Buy Phase

1) Attack Phase
During that phase, you choose any number creatures among the one that you control and declare them as "attacking". Then the defending player will declare which of his own creature will block which attacking creature.
=> unblocked creature will reach the opponent city & destry 1 part of the city (same result if several creature are non-blocked).

2) Play Phase
During that phase, you can play spell & creatures in any order

3) Buy Phase
During that phase you can buy cards. Each card cost 1 card to discard, sometimes with pre-requisites on the kind of card to discard.

Once that is done, you draw 3 cards and the other player's turn starts.
217430.name: Bellum

217431.name: Darien Apocalypse
217431.description:
The Kingdom of Scotland's Darien scheme was the result of an inspired idea to found a colony on the Isthmus of Panama. Back in the late 17th century, this would have allowed goods from the Pacific to be quickly traded across the Atlantic (and vice versa), and it seemed a fortune was there for the taking. Regrettably the adventure was beset by disease, shortage of supplies, the unremitting hardships of the jungle, and the Spanish! After all, they were trying to build a trading hub right in the middle of Spain's Empire.

Darien Apocalypse is Ragnar Brothers' second Quantum game, and it features four similar but different worlds together with the four Horsemen of the Apocalypse. One world may prosper, whilst another suffers deprivation. Scots are enlisted, ships sail, lands are explored. The original Caledonians managed to build a small encampment a fort and a watch tower. So buildings feature and drive the game, providing goods to raise more capital and special abilities to help build the colony and counter the Horsemen threat.

This game can be played co-operatively or competitively. It feels like a struggle — it was a struggle!

217432.name: Qube: Gott & lyxigt
217432.description:
500 questions about food and luxurious things in five different category's (Fragrances, Good tastes, Things that cost, Beverage and Miscellaneous).

In the box you will find:
100 question cards (5 questions on each)
49 category cards
Rules
15 sample question cards from other Qube games.

217433.name: Mr. Wino
217433.description:
Casette inlay
Mr Wino is trapped in his own nightmare after a night out getting drunk and falling asleep in his home. To escape from this nightmare and wake up, you must control Mr Wino in this flick-screen platform game and collect all the bottles on each level made up over various screens to open barrier to the exit. Some bottles collected will open doors blocking exits and each screen needs to be completed before his air gauge that is slowly decreasing runs out. Moving around the various screens are creatures and if these are touched then you lose one of three lives. Certain objects also need avoiding like spikes and moving pillars with moving platforms to encounter.

User Summary
Was named Mr. Wino on all cassettes, but only in title screen on Commodore 64. For Amstrad and ZX Spectrum the title screen said Willy Wino's Stag Night

217434.name: El Juego del Rico Rico
217434.description:
El Juego del Rico Rico is a card game in which you have to be the first player who complete a cooking recipe.

Each player have one cooking recipe with 5 ingredients for cook it, and another 5 cards with one ingredient.

You´ll have to change your ingredient cards until you have the correct. The first who do it, win

217437.name: Out of the Ruins: Helkaraxe
217437.description:
From publisher blurb:

Helkaraxe, a bridge of ice from Manwe to Valinor and back, for those who do not have the ships to make it

Helkaraxe, A place of utter dark, black on black, shades on shades, where the only light is from stars and stations

Helkaraxe, the ultimate freedom and the ultimate opportunity, the ultimate frivolity and the ultimate prison

Helkaraxe, where Morgoth Bauglir whispers into your soul

217438.name: Arcade Classics (C64 / Firebird / 1987)
217438.description:
User Summary
A compilation of four classic arcade games ported for C64 on one tape.
At the title screen you have four arcade machines visible with the title, light sign telling which game it is, and you pick the game you want by a bar.

The compilation contains Space Invaders, Astroids, Snakes, and Space Wars.

217439.name: Mesmerists of Porphyra
217439.description:
From publisher blurb:

Look into my eyes… you must obtain… Mesmerists of Porphyra!

On the Patchwork Planet of Porphyra, the will to survive and use others towards that end has saved many a life- and a nation! A towering ego that brooks no control but his own… lies that cannot be unraveled… mesmerist tricks that baffle, confound, and enrage foes to the point of defeat! Such is the wonder and indispensability of the new Mesmerist class, a fascinating addition to your favorite tabletop RPG game! In the new Mesmerists of Porphyra by Aaron Hollingsworth and Blake Morton, published by Purple Duck Games, you will meet 13 exciting new archetypes like the magical arcane manipulator, exotic elemental eye, sinister Hell-raising kytonik, foppish macaroni, hundred-eyed panoptes, unparalleled vision and incomparable master mesmerist! Along with these amazing archetypes is an amazing amount of new material for the mesmerist; 6 new bold stares, 10 new mesmerist tricks, 7 vile tricks (beware!), 6 new master tricks, and 9 feats found on Porphyra! Along with these are new mesmerist equipment, new magic item qualities, and the new narcissism corruption with 9 manifestations!

217440.name: Arcade Classics (C64 / US Gold / 1987)
217440.description:
User Summary

A compilation of four games published by Ocean, Ltd. The games are the following classics:
Dig Dug
Mr. Do!
Pac-Man
Pole Position

217441.name: Arcade Classics (CD-i / 1996)
217441.description:
User Summary
Three arcade games, ported to the Philips CD-i format

217442.name: Fine Wine & Dining
217442.description:
From the introduction:

Lord Ashfell seeks the very finest things in life, even at great peril to those in his employ!

A short, dangerous adventure for 4-5 chacters of level 3-4.

217443.name: Journey to the Crystal Keep
217443.description:
From the introduction:

Within the small duchy of Almethieu dark forces are coming together in an effort to disrupt the pleasant lives of the towns and villages. With the Duke himself falling ill after an attack on the road by a group of lycanthropes, an antidote is needed to keep him from becoming a lycanthrope himself. The only cure in the area to be found is in the magic wellspring of The Crystal Keep. Rumors and mystery surround this keep and most town folk swear that the old wizard who lived there has turned evil along with his Dwarven knights. With time running short, the duke and his advisors offer great reward for the retrieval of a vial of this magical water. Will the party find the cure to save the duke and these lands? Are rumors true about the fate of the wizard and his Dwarves? Only the bravest and most cunning will succeed.

A 6-8 hour adventure for 3-5 1st level characters

217444.name: Starlifter
217444.description:
From cassette cover
It is 2150. The war with the veil Peradusians continues apace, the planetary forces continue to slug it out on the surfaces of forgotten planets with names such as Farantoo and Seratzo.
Terra is allied with the so-called Black Swans from Cygnis, huge badger-like creatyres with dexterous hands, and the Jaharians, the exotic blue-green coloured aliens from the Lesser Magellenic Cloud, also called Space Fairies due to their resemblance to those mythical creatures of elder times - even though they do not have wings.

217445.name: Mallorca Express
217445.description:
Description from the designer:

A print & play board game (using components from Finca) for 2-6 players.

In Mallorca Express each player represents a Majorcan farmer growing fruits and trying to sell them for as much profit as possible.

Regarding game mechanics, Mallorca Express is influenced by games like Alien Frontiers and Troyes and their use of dice for worker placement.

217446.name: Caverns Of Eriban
217446.description:
From cassette cover
As the pilot of a mine supply ship, your task is to enter the Caverns of Eriban to deliver supplies to the subterranean mining depots. On the planet's surface are five supply depots with chequered yellow landing strips.
If there is a white flashing light on top of the depot building, you can land and collect 5 supplies and refuel your craft.
